title: Evel Knievel 1971 | Action, Biography | Full Movie | George Hamilton, Sue Lyon | Subtitled

sources.title: Evel Knievel 1971 | Action, Biography | Full Movie | George Hamilton, Sue Lyon | Subtitled
sources.description:
Hell, I'm the best...the last of the daredevils...and my death - IT WILL BE GLORIOUS!" Biography of the famed motorcycle daredevil, much of which was filmed in his home town of Butte, Montana. The film depicts Knievel reflecting on major events in his life just before a big jump.

Original title: Evel Knievel (1971)

Director: Marvin J. Chomsky 
Writers: Alan Caillou, Alan Caillou 
Stars: George Hamilton, Sue Lyon, Bert Freed 
Genres: Action, Biography, Drama
